doc:
Ebbe Roe Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ebbe_Roe_Smith 0 Ebbe Roe Smith (born June 25, 1949) is an American actor and screenwriter, perhaps best known as the writer of the film Falling Down.As an actor, Smith is known for such films and television series as Outrageous Fortune, The Big Easy, Fatal Beauty and Murphy Brown. Ebbe_Roe_Smith ( born June_25_,_1949 ) is an_American_actor_and_screenwriter , perhaps_best_known as the_writer of the_film Falling Down.As an_actor , Smith is_known for such_films_and_television_series as Outrageous_Fortune , The_Big_Easy , Fatal_Beauty and Murphy_Brown .
